response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its high quality and unique features, the product is valued at $15,000 to me. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value I place on the product and the benefits it would provide to you. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask.", "product_price": 12000}
